Contract duration: The Surgical Package Deal Cost is including:
1-All related investigations or procedures once the operation is decided to be done as per the attending doctor advice. (including preoperative investigations)
2-All Medicine related to the operation recommended by attending physician for In-patient use.
4-Follow up visits within 14 post-operative days as long as it is related to the   operation.
5--All Medical and Surgical supplies, Consumables, Implants, Stents, Valves, Devices, Operation Theater, surgeon fees, Professional fees, and Anesthesia fees.
Exclusions of the Surgical Package Deal Cost

3- Any Chronic Disease that should be monitored before operation done e.g. DM, Bronchial Asthma - in such case Pakcage Deal will start first day operation performed, and approval should be taken for preoperative monitoring.
4- Any special Investigation such as MRI, Chromosomal studiesetc., providing it should be done prior to the operation or after that.
5- Abnormal and Unexpected Complications e.g. Heart Attack, CVA, etc.,
7- Any Extra consultation requested by the patient and not normally done.
8- Extra Days in the hospital than the agreed period specified in the Package Deal List.
